About.title: About me
About.about: A junior web developer with 11 months of experience working in a team for a marketplace webapp. Always trying to learn new things (which makes the JS ecosystem perfect for me, a new framework everyday haha) because that is what makes me motivated to keep programming.
About.about_2: My current short/medium term goal is becoming advanced in React and Next.js while always improving my code skills to write maintainable and scalable apps, while the long term is becoming a fullstack developer.
